AppPush.Title: Welcome to Collapse Launcher
AppPush.Message: Now you can install or migrate your existing game here. For more information/guides, please visit: https://github.com/neon-nyan/CollapseLauncher/Wiki

RegionPush.Title: Welcome to Houkai 3rd (Honkai Impact 3rd Japan) PC Client
RegionPush.Message: Hi there, We are glad to announce you that Houkai 3rd is now availabe on Collapse Launcher! We hope you enjoy to play in this new supported server.

RegionPush.Title: Important Note before doing Delta Patch Update
RegionPush.Message: We have a report that the launcher might false detect verified files and causing them to be redownloaded. In this case, please update your launcher to 1.0.52.6 version. If you haven't receive the update notification, please go to App Settings menu > Click on "Check Update".
